gods_and_mages_engine.Abilities

Class AttackAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • gods_and_mages_engine.Abilities.BaseAbility
      • gods_and_mages_engine.Abilities.AttackAbility

  • public class AttackAbility
extends BaseAbility
    Used for abilities used in battles to cause damage and/or a status effect to opposing LivingCreature.
